translated: Thus, having understood the characteristic of suffering through these ten aspects which are included in four aspects, he then understands the characteristic of the truth of origination through four aspects, namely, cause, origination, successive causation, and condition, asking himself: “What is the cause of suffering, what is its origination, what is its successive causation, and what are its conditions? ”

original: de la rgyu ni srid pa ste /
analyzed: de la rgyu ni srid pa ste /
translated: The cause is existence,

original: sdug bsngal 'phen par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdug bsngal 'phen par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it propels suffering.

original: kun 'byung ba ni 'phangs nas mngon par 'grub par byed cing kun 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba ni 'phangs nas mngon par 'grub par byed cing kun 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Origination is the cause of the origination of the effect, because it projects and establishes the effect.

original: rab tu skye ba ni sdug bsngal mngon par grub pa de de las rab tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rab tu skye ba ni sdug bsngal mngon par grub pa de de las rab tu skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Production is the production of the effect from the cause.

original: rkyen ni ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rim gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rkyen ni ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi sa bon yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rim gyis sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Condition is the cause of the future effect, because it holds the seed of the future suffering and gradually brings about the transformation of suffering.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang sred pa ni len pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang / len pa dang len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i srid pa yang dag par 'grub par byed pa yin pa dang / srid pa sngon du btang ba'i skye ba rab tu skye bar byed pa yin pa dang /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang sred pa ni len pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin pa dang / len pa dang len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i srid pa yang dag par 'grub par byed pa yin pa dang / srid pa sngon du btang ba'i skye ba rab tu skye bar byed pa yin pa dang /
translated: Another explanation is that craving is the cause of grasping, and grasping and the cause of grasping bring about the establishment of existence. Existence precedes birth and brings about the production of birth.

original: skye ba'i rkyen gyi sa rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan la sogs pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i phyir rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen yin te go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba'i rkyen gyi sa rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan la sogs pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa'i phyir rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen yin te go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
translated: The condition of birth is the cause, origin, production, and condition of aging, sickness, death, sorrow, and so on, in that order.

original: rnam grangs gzhan yang sred pa'i bag la nyal ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni phyi ma la /
analyzed: rnam grangs gzhan yang sred pa'i bag la nyal ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal lus la zhen pa gang yin pa de ni phyi ma la /
translated: Another explanation: the latent afflictions such as the latent afflictions of craving are the cause of the subsequent body.

original: yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no //🔽de las skyes pa'i kun nas dkris pa ni kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen yin par ci rigs par sbyar te /
analyzed: yang srid pa mngon par 'grub pa'i rgyu yin no // de las skyes pa'i kun nas dkris pa ni kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen yin par ci rigs par sbyar te /
translated: The latent afflictions of craving are the cause of the establishment of rebirth.🔽The entanglements that arise from those latent afflictions are the origin, production, and condition of the subsequent body, in that order.

original: de la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa'i sred pa yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: de la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa'i sred pa yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba yin no //
translated: The origin of the subsequent body is the origin of the subsequent body because it establishes the existence of the subsequent body.

original: yang 'byung ba srid pa'i sred pa de dag dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa rab tu skyed bar byed pa yin no //🔽dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa skyes pa de ni /🔽de dang de dag tu mngon par dga' ba'i @188a * //
analyzed: yang 'byung ba srid pa'i sred pa de dag dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa rab tu skyed bar byed pa yin no // dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sred pa skyes pa de ni / de dang de dag tu mngon par dga' ba'i @188a * //
translated: Moreover, the craving for the arising of existence gives rise to craving that is associated with the delight of attraction.

original: sred pa'i rkyen yin te /
analyzed: sred pa'i rkyen yin te /
translated: The craving that is associated with the delight of attraction is a condition for delighting in this and that.

original: de ltar de'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas dkris pa'i sred pa rnam pa gsum la brten nas /
analyzed: de ltar de'i bag la nyal gyi rnam pa dang / kun nas dkris pa'i sred pa rnam pa gsum la brten nas /
translated: Thus, in dependence on the three types of craving that are related to the latent forms of manifest craving,

original: phyi ma la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa mngon par grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur bas na /
analyzed: phyi ma la yang 'byung ba'i srid pa mngon par grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur bas na /
translated: the arising of existence will be actualized and occur in the future.

original: de'i phyir rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Therefore, the terms “cause,” “origin,” “arising,” and “condition” are stated.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa de rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed do /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa de rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed do /
translated: In this way, the practitioner understands the characteristic of the truth of origination through these four aspects.🔽The Śrāvaka Levels

original: // / nyan thos kyi sa bam po nyi shu pa ste tha ma /
analyzed: // / nyan thos kyi sa bam po nyi shu pa ste tha ma /
translated: says:🔽“What is the truth of origination?

original: de ltar des bden pa kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rig nas /
analyzed: de ltar des bden pa kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid so sor rig nas /
translated: Thus, having discerned the characteristics of the truth of origination,

original: bden pa kun 'byung ba de ma lus par zad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bden pa kun 'byung ba de ma lus par zad pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to completely eliminate the truth of origination,

original: 'gog pa la 'gog pa dang / bden pa dang / sdug bsngal ma lus par zad pa'i phyir zhi ba dang / mchog dang gtso bo dang / bla na med pa yin pa'i phyir gya nom pa dang / rtag pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'i sgo nas kun du rtog par byed do //
analyzed: 'gog pa la 'gog pa dang / bden pa dang / sdug bsngal ma lus par zad pa'i phyir zhi ba dang / mchog dang gtso bo dang / bla na med pa yin pa'i phyir gya nom pa dang / rtag pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba'i sgo nas kun du rtog par byed do //
translated: he conceives of cessation as cessation, as truth, as peace, as supreme, as foremost, as unsurpassed, as excellence, and as definitive release, because it is the complete elimination of suffering.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pa de rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pa de rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed do //
translated: Thus, the yogin discerns the characteristics of the truth of cessation through these four aspects.

original: de ltar bden pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid so sor rig nas shes bya yongs su tshol ba'i don dang / yang dag pa yongs su tshol ba'i don dang / sgo bzhis rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i don gyis lam la lam dang /
analyzed: de ltar bden pa 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid so sor rig nas shes bya yongs su tshol ba'i don dang / yang dag pa yongs su tshol ba'i don dang / sgo bzhis rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i don gyis lam la lam dang /
translated: Thus, having understood the characteristics of the truth of cessation, they investigate objects of knowledge, they investigate reality, they engage in the four doors, and they proceed on the single path to nirvāṇa.

original: rigs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nges par 'byin pa'i sgo nas kun du rtog par byed de /
analyzed: rigs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nges par 'byin pa'i sgo nas kun du rtog par byed de /
translated: They thoroughly investigate the path in terms of its being a path, its being a reason, its being an accomplishment, and its being a means of deliverance.

original: de de ltar rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa lam gyi mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed de /
analyzed: de de ltar rnam pa bzhi po de dag gis bden pa lam gyi mtshan nyid so sor rig par byed de /
translated: Thus, they understand the characteristics of the truth of the path in terms of these four aspects.

original: de ni de'i nang gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ni de'i nang gi so so rang gi 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the attention that understands the characteristics of the four truths that are specific to the noble ones.

original: des de ltar bdag nyid kyi phung po rnams la bden pa'i tshul gyis nye bar brtags shing rnam par dpyad nas /
analyzed: des de ltar bdag nyid kyi phung po rnams la bden pa'i tshul gyis nye bar brtags shing rnam par dpyad nas /
translated: Having thus examined and investigated the aggregates in terms of the principle of the truth,

original: khams mi 'dra ba'i phung po lkog tu gyur pa rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas de dag kyang 'di lta bu'i chos nyid dang / 'di lta bu'i tshul du rtogs pa yin no zhes rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: khams mi 'dra ba'i phung po lkog tu gyur pa rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas de dag kyang 'di lta bu'i chos nyid dang / 'di lta bu'i tshul du rtogs pa yin no zhes rtogs par byed de /
translated: And with regard to the aggregates of different elements that are hidden, he understands them by means of inference, thinking, “They are also understood in this way, by this principle, and in this manner.”

original: 'dus byas gang yin pa ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas gang yin pa ci yang rung ste /
translated: Whatever is compounded,

original: de dag thams cad ni thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas de lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin pas de dag 'gog pa ni zhi ba yin la /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni thams cad du rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo nas de lta bu'i rang bzhin can yin pas de dag 'gog pa ni zhi ba yin la /
translated: all of it is in every way of that nature. Therefore, its cessation is peace,

original: de spong ba'i @188b lam ni nges par 'byin pa yin par so sor rtog par byed do //
analyzed: de spong ba'i @188b lam ni nges par 'byin pa yin par so sor rtog par byed do //
translated: and the path that abandons it is deliverance.

original: de la bdag nyid kyi phung po lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams la bden par shis pa gang yin pa dang / khams mi 'dra ba'i phung po lkog tu gyur pa rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de la bdag nyid kyi phung po lkog tu ma gyur pa rnams la bden par shis pa gang yin pa dang / khams mi 'dra ba'i phung po lkog tu gyur pa rnams la rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The understanding of the aggregates that are not hidden by means of direct perception, and the understanding of the aggregates of different elements that are hidden by means of inference,

original: chos shes pa dang / rjes su shes pa dag skye ba'i sa bon lta bu yin te /
analyzed: chos shes pa dang / rjes su shes pa dag skye ba'i sa bon lta bu yin te /
translated: It is the seed for the arising of the cognition of phenomena and subsequent cognition.

original: mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa de yang thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / 'dres pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid so sor rig pa'i yid la byed pa de yang thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / 'dres pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: This attention that discerns the characteristics should be understood as being of three types: derived from hearing, reflection, and meditation.

original: rnal 'byor ba des de ltar legs par dpyad pa'i rgyus /
analyzed: rnal 'byor ba des de ltar legs par dpyad pa'i rgyus /
translated: The yogi/nī, through the power of such thorough analysis,

original: gang gi tshe 'di lta ste /🔽'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pas 'di lta ste /🔽bden pa ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid las brtsams te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di lta ste / 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pas 'di lta ste / bden pa ji snyed yod pa nyid dang / ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid las brtsams te /
translated: at a certain point🔽will gain certainty in the four noble truths through the sixteen aspects,

original: rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na ni /
analyzed: rnam pa bcu drug po de dag gis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la nges pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de'i tshe na ni /
translated: beginning with the fact that they exist in terms of the way things really are and the way things really are in their variety.

original: thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba dang 'dres pa'i yid la byed pa las yang dag par 'das nas /
analyzed: thos pa dang bsams pa las byung ba dang 'dres pa'i yid la byed pa las yang dag par 'das nas /
translated: At that point, he or she will have gone beyond the attention derived from hearing, reflection, and meditation and

original: gcig tu bsgom pa'i rnam pas mos par byed do //
analyzed: gcig tu bsgom pa'i rnam pas mos par byed do //
translated: will be devoted to the practice of meditation.

original: de ni de'i mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni de'i mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa yin te /
translated: This is the attention that arises from devotion.

original: bden pa la dmigs pa dang / gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: bden pa la dmigs pa dang / gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: It is focused on the truth and is one-pointed.

original: des de kun du bsten ba'i rgyus bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bden pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas nas shes pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur te /
analyzed: des de kun du bsten ba'i rgyus bden pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bden pa kun 'byung ba'i bden pa gnyis kyi dbang du byas nas shes pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur te /
translated: By cultivating that, one attains infinite knowledge in terms of the two truths: the truth of suffering and the truth of the origin of suffering.

original: des mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa yin no zhes mi rtag pa mtha' yas pa nyid du mos par byed de //
analyzed: des mi rtag pa la mi rtag pa yin no zhes mi rtag pa mtha' yas pa nyid du mos par byed de //
translated: One becomes convinced that impermanence is infinite, thinking, “Impermanence is impermanence.”

original: de bzhin du sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa nyid dang / stong pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / bdag med pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / nyes par spyad pa mtha' yas ba nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa nyid dang / stong pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / bdag med pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / nyes par spyad pa mtha' yas ba nyid dang /
translated: Similarly, one becomes convinced that suffering is infinite, that emptiness is infinite, that selflessness is infinite, that defilement is infinite, that misdeeds are infinite,

original: ngan song du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa nyid dang / 'byor pa rnams kyi rgud pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa nyid dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
analyzed: ngan song du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa nyid dang / 'byor pa rnams kyi rgud pa mtha' yas pa nyid dang / skye ba mtha' yas pa nyid dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang /
translated: He should reflect on the infinite number of rebirths in the lower realms, the infinite number of misfortunes of the wealthy, the infinite number of births, the infinite number of old ages, illnesses, deaths, sorrows, lamentations,

original: sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mtha' yas ba nyid du mos par byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mtha' yas ba nyid du mos par byed do //
translated: sufferings, mental pains, and disturbances.

original: de la mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Infinite” means

original: 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i chos de dag la mtha' med pa dang / mu med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i chos de dag la mtha' med pa dang / mu med pa yin te /
translated: that the phenomena of cyclic existence are endless and limitless.

original: 'khor ba ji srid yod kyi @189a * //
analyzed: 'khor ba ji srid yod kyi @189a * //
translated: As long as cyclic existence exists,

original: bar du chos de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: bar du chos de dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur la /
translated: those phenomena will occur.

original: 'khor ba ma lus par zad par gyur na /
analyzed: 'khor ba ma lus par zad par gyur na /
translated: If cyclic existence were to end completely,

original: de dag kyang zad par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de dag kyang zad par 'gyur gyi /
translated: they would also end.🔽Otherwise, they would not end.

original: gzhan du na zad par 'gyur ba med do zhes de ltar srid pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba thams cad la /
analyzed: gzhan du na zad par 'gyur ba med do zhes de ltar srid pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba thams cad la /
translated: In this way, he should reflect on all existences, migrations, deaths, and births.

original: smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / rten pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mi mthun pa'i rnam pas mos par byed pa na /
analyzed: smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / rten pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mi mthun pa'i rnam pas mos par byed pa na /
translated: When one has interest in the aspects of the truths of cessation and the path,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,

original: mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa sgom par byed do //
analyzed: mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa sgom par byed do //
translated: one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.

original: des de ltar srid pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad las sems skyo bar byas shing skrag par byas nas /
analyzed: des de ltar srid pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba thams cad las sems skyo bar byas shing skrag par byas nas /
translated: When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam pa gang yang rung bas sems gtod par byed pa na /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la rnam pa gang yang rung bas sems gtod par byed pa na /
translated: one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.

original: de'i sems de yun ring po nas gzugs la dga' ba dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la dga' zhing /
analyzed: de'i sems de yun ring po nas gzugs la dga' ba dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la dga' zhing /
translated: When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,🔽one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence of desire, the absence of hatred, and the absence of ignorance,

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dag gis kun du bsags shing nye bar bsags par gyur pas /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dag gis kun du bsags shing nye bar bsags par gyur pas /
translated: one cultivates the attention that arises from the discernment of the teaching.🔽When one has interest in the aspects of the absence

original: des na lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la sems gtad du zin kyang zhi ba'i dbyings nyid mi 'dod cing yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir sems 'jug par mi 'gyur /🔽dang bar mi 'gyur /🔽gnas par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: des na lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la sems gtad du zin kyang zhi ba'i dbyings nyid mi 'dod cing yongs su gdung bar byed pa'i phyir sems 'jug par mi 'gyur / dang bar mi 'gyur / gnas par mi 'gyur /
translated: Therefore, although the mind is directed to nirvana with a superior intention, it does not engage, does not become clear and does not remain, because it does not wish for the expanse of peace.🔽

original: mos par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mos par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: Therefore, although the mind is directed to nirvana with a superior intention, it does not engage, does not become clear, does not remain, and does not aspire because it does not desire the realm of peace itself and is tormented.

original: yid phyir ldog par gyur na /
analyzed: yid phyir ldog par gyur na /
translated: The mind turns back.

original: des sems de bden pa sdug bsngal dang / bden pa kun 'byung ba dag la yang dang yang du skyo bar byed cing skrag par byed de /
analyzed: des sems de bden pa sdug bsngal dang / bden pa kun 'byung ba dag la yang dang yang du skyo bar byed cing skrag par byed de /
translated: Having turned back, the mind is repeatedly saddened and frightened by the truth of suffering and the truth of the origin.

original: skyo bar byas shing skrag par byas nas kyang ;🔽lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dang yang du mya ngan las 'das pa la /
analyzed: skyo bar byas shing skrag par byas nas kyang ; lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dang yang du mya ngan las 'das pa la /
translated: Having been saddened and frightened,

original: sems gtod par byed mod kyi /
analyzed: sems gtod par byed mod kyi /
translated: it is directed again and again to nirvana with a superior intention.

original: 'on kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: However, it does not engage.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'di lta ste /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di lta ste /
translated: Why is that?🔽Because it is obstructed from realizing

original: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du gcod par byed pas bdag 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la mngon par rtogs pa'i bar du gcod par byed pas bdag 'khor bar 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: that it will revolve in cyclic existence.

original: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: I will attain complete nirvana.

original: bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i chos rnams bsgom par bya'o //
translated: I will cultivate virtuous qualities in order to attain complete nirvana.

original: bdag gis sdug bsngal sdug bsngal gyi sgo nas mthong bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sdug bsngal sdug bsngal gyi sgo nas mthong bar bya'o //
translated: I will see suffering in terms of suffering.

original: kun 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'gog pa 'gog pa'i sgo dang / lam lam gyi sgo nas mthong bar bya'o //
analyzed: kun 'byung ba kun 'byung ba'i sgo dang / 'gog pa 'gog pa'i sgo dang / lam lam gyi sgo nas mthong bar bya'o //
translated: I will see origination in terms of origination, cessation in terms of cessation, and the path in terms of the path.

original: bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i @189b sgo nas mthong bar bya ste /🔽chos de dag ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems pa'i nga rgyal rags pa yod pa de yid la byed pa'i rjes su zhugs pas na /
analyzed: bdag gis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / smon pa med pa smon pa med pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma med pa mtshan ma med pa'i @189b sgo nas mthong bar bya ste / chos de dag ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems pa'i nga rgyal rags pa yod pa de yid la byed pa'i rjes su zhugs pas na /
translated: I will see emptiness in terms of emptiness, signlessness in terms of signlessness, and wishlessness in terms of wishlessness.🔽These are my dharmas.

original: bar du gcod cing sgrib pa dang bcas bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bar du gcod cing sgrib pa dang bcas bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it engages while being obstructed and obscured by the coarseness of the pride that thinks this way.

original: rgyu de dang rkyen des na lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la sems gtad du zin kyang /
analyzed: rgyu de dang rkyen des na lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la sems gtad du zin kyang /
translated: For that reason and through that condition, although one has directed one’s mind to nirvana with a superior intention,

original: de'i sems 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i sems 'jug par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: one’s mind does not engage in it.

original: des bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal de nyid bar du gcod par byed pa yin no zhes shes rab kyis myur ba myur ba kho nar rtogs par byas nas /
analyzed: des bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal de nyid bar du gcod par byed pa yin no zhes shes rab kyis myur ba myur ba kho nar rtogs par byas nas /
translated: One should quickly and swiftly understand with wisdom that the very pride that thinks “I am” is the obstacle.

original: rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa spangs shing /🔽phyi rol gyi shes bya'i dmigs pa las rnam par bzlog nas yid la byed pa la zhugs pa dang yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i bden pa rnam par gcod pa la rtsom par byed de des sems byung zhing 'gags pa na mjug thogs su skye ba'i sems
analyzed: rang gi ngang gis 'jug pa'i yid la byed pa spangs shing / phyi rol gyi shes bya'i dmigs pa las rnam par bzlog nas yid la byed pa la zhugs pa dang yid la byed pa dang ldan pa'i bden pa rnam par gcod pa la rtsom par byed de des sems byung zhing 'gags pa na mjug thogs su skye ba'i sems
translated: One should abandon the mental attention that engages naturally

original: kyis rgyun dang rjes su 'brel pa'i tshul gyis 'jig par mthong zhing /
analyzed: kyis rgyun dang rjes su 'brel pa'i tshul gyis 'jig par mthong zhing /
translated: and turn away from the external object of knowledge. One should engage in mental attention and possess mental attention. One should begin to discern the truths. When the mind arises and ceases, the subsequent mind sees it as destroyed in the manner of being connected to a continuum.

original: de ci nas kyang bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de skye ba'i skabs med par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sems kyis sems la dmigs par byed cing nges par 'dzin par byed do
analyzed: de ci nas kyang bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yid la byed pa'i rjes su 'jug pa gang yin pa de skye ba'i skabs med par bya ba'i phyir de ltar sems kyis sems la dmigs par byed cing nges par 'dzin par byed do
translated: In order to prevent the arising of any mental activity that is associated with the pride that thinks “I am” and that would interrupt this process, he focuses his mind on the mind and determines it in this way.

original: // rnal 'byor pa de de ltar brtson par byed pa na /
analyzed: // rnal 'byor pa de de ltar brtson par byed pa na /
translated: As the spiritual practitioner exerts himself in this way,

original: rim gyis de'i sems kyi rgyud de dag gzhan dang gzhan du sar pa sar pa dang / rnying pa ma yin pa rnying pa ma yin pa dang / byung nas 'jig pa dang / re zhig pa dang / yun ring du mi gnas pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rim gyis de'i sems kyi rgyud de dag gzhan dang gzhan du sar pa sar pa dang / rnying pa ma yin pa rnying pa ma yin pa dang / byung nas 'jig pa dang / re zhig pa dang / yun ring du mi gnas pa nyid du mthong bar 'gyur te /
translated: he gradually sees that the continuum of his mind is fresh and fresh, not old and not old, that it arises and disintegrates, that it is temporary and does not remain for a long time.

original: de ni de'i mi rtag pa nyid kyis yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni de'i mi rtag pa nyid kyis yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: This is the attention that is focused on impermanence.

original: sems kyi rgyud de nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams kyi rjes su zhugs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'i sdug bsngal ba yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud de nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams kyi rjes su zhugs par mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'i sdug bsngal ba yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: The attention that is focused on suffering is the observation that the continuum of the mind is associated with the appropriated aggregates.

original: de la sems las gzhan pa'i chos gnyis pa mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i stong pa nyid kyi yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la sems las gzhan pa'i chos gnyis pa mi dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni de'i stong pa nyid kyi yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: The attention to emptiness of that is the non-apprehension of a second phenomenon apart from mind.

original: de la sems kyi rgyud de nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid dang / rang dbang med pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag med pa'i yid la byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de la sems kyi rgyud de nyid rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid dang / rang dbang med pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni de'i bdag med pa'i yid la byed pa yin te /
translated: The attention to selflessness of that is the seeing of that very continuum of mind as dependent origination and as powerless.

original: de ltar na re zhig bden pa sdug bsngal la zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na re zhig bden pa sdug bsngal la zhugs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, he is engaged in the truth of suffering.

original: 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks as follows:

original: sems kyi rgyud 'di yang sred pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang / sred pa las kun du 'byung ba @190a * //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud 'di yang sred pa'i rgyu las byung ba dang / sred pa las kun du 'byung ba @190a * //
translated: This continuum of mind arises from the cause of craving, originates from craving,

original: dang ; sred pa las rab tu skyes pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: dang ; sred pa las rab tu skyes pa dang / sred pa'i rkyen las byung ba yin te /
translated: is produced from craving, and arises from the condition of craving.

original: sems kyi rgyud de'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba yin no //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud de'i 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba yin no //
translated: The cessation of that continuum of mind is peace.

original: de'i 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni nges par 'byin pa yin no snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de'i 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam gang yin pa de ni nges par 'byin pa yin no snyam du sems te /
translated: The path that leads to its cessation is deliverance.

original: de ltar na shes rab phra bas ma brtags pa'i yid la byed pa la rtog pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na shes rab phra bas ma brtags pa'i yid la byed pa la rtog pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag la zhugs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, by the method of reflection, he enters the four noble truths with a mental attention that is not examined by subtle wisdom.

original: des shes rab de kun du bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus dmigs par bya ba dang / dmigs par byed pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: des shes rab de kun du bsten cing goms par byas lan mang du byas pa'i rgyus dmigs par bya ba dang / dmigs par byed pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: By the cause of cultivating and frequently practicing that wisdom, the wisdom that is the same as and similar to the object and the subject arises.

original: des de'i mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' ba'i bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal rags pa gang yin pa de kun du spyod pa'i sgo nas spong bar 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: des de'i mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' ba'i bar du gcod par byed pa nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal rags pa gang yin pa de kun du spyod pa'i sgo nas spong bar 'gyur zhing /
translated: By that, the coarse pride that thinks “I am” which is an obstruction to his delight in nirvana is abandoned by the method of practice.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems gtad pa 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas sems gtad pa 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
translated: The mind that is focused on nirvana with superior intention enters.

original: yongs su gdung bas yid phyir ldog pa yang med par 'gyur la lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon par dga' ba yang yid la 'dzin par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su gdung bas yid phyir ldog pa yang med par 'gyur la lhag pa'i bsam pas mngon par dga' ba yang yid la 'dzin par byed do //
translated: The mind does not turn back due to distress, and it holds the delight of superior intention.

original: de'i dmigs par bya ba dang / dmigs par byed pa mnyam zhing mtshungs ba'i ye shes bzod pa chung du dang ldan pa de lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dro bar gyur pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dmigs par bya ba dang / dmigs par byed pa mnyam zhing mtshungs ba'i ye shes bzod pa chung du dang ldan pa de lta bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni dro bar gyur pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That is called heat.

original: bzod pa 'bring gis yang dag par bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni rtse mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa 'bring gis yang dag par bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni rtse mo zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is included in medium patience is called the peak.

original: bzod pa chen pos yang dag par bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: bzod pa chen pos yang dag par bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa zhes bya'o //
translated: That which is included in great patience is called the acquiescence in the truth of suffering.

original: des de ltar bar du gcod par byed pa'i nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs shing lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' ba yongs su bzung nas gong nas gong du sems brtag par bya ba la mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin
analyzed: des de ltar bar du gcod par byed pa'i nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs shing lhag pa'i bsam pas mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' ba yongs su bzung nas gong nas gong du sems brtag par bya ba la mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin
translated: Having thus abandoned the pride of thinking “I am” which interrupts that, and having taken up the superior intention which delights in nirvana, he abandons the effort to investigate the mind further and further.

original: pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa de spangs te /
analyzed: pa'i mngon par 'du byed pa de spangs te /
translated: That effort is abandoned.

original: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems 'jog par byed do //
analyzed: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i sems 'jog par byed do //
translated: He places his mind in a non-conceptual state, without any volitional effort.

original: de'i tshe na de'i sems de 'gags pa lta bur yang snang mod kyi /
analyzed: de'i tshe na de'i sems de 'gags pa lta bur yang snang mod kyi /
translated: At that time, his mind appears to be stopped,

original: de 'gags pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de 'gags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not stopped.

original: de dmigs pa med pa lta bur yang snang mod kyi /
analyzed: de dmigs pa med pa lta bur yang snang mod kyi /
translated: It appears to be without an object,

original: de dmigs pa med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de dmigs pa med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: but it is not without an object.

original: de'i sems de rab tu zhi zhing med pa lta bur yang snang mod @190b kyi de med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i sems de rab tu zhi zhing med pa lta bur yang snang mod @190b kyi de med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: That mind appears to be pacified and non-existent, but it is not non-existent.

original: de'i tshe na sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu gnyid kyis log par 'gyur ba lta bu yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe na sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu gnyid kyis log par 'gyur ba lta bu yang ma yin te /
translated: At that time, it is not like a bee that has fallen asleep while making honey.

original: rnam par gsal zhing zhi gnas kyi rnam pa las mi mtho mi dma' ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: rnam par gsal zhing zhi gnas kyi rnam pa las mi mtho mi dma' ba kho na yin no //
translated: It is clear and does not rise or fall from the aspect of śamatha.

original: shes rab zhen pa mong rtul bar mngon bar rtogs pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa gang yin pa la la'i sems ni sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu gnyid kyis log pa bzhin du 'gags par snang ba lta bu yang yod mod kyi de yang 'gags pa ni🔽ma yin no //
analyzed: shes rab zhen pa mong rtul bar mngon bar rtogs pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal byed pa gang yin pa la la'i sems ni sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu gnyid kyis log pa bzhin du 'gags par snang ba lta bu yang yod mod kyi de yang 'gags pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The mind of some appears to be stopped, like a bee that has fallen asleep while making honey, but that is not the case.

original: sems de ni mngon par rtogs pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: sems de ni mngon par rtogs pa kho na yin te /
translated: That mind is only a realization.

original: sems kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de ring po mi thogs par yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems kyi gnas skabs 'di lta bur gyur ba gang yin pa de ni de ring po mi thogs par yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: Whatever state of mind becomes like this, that will soon enter into the certainty of reality.

original: de'i thams cad kyi tha ma rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems de'i mjug thogs su sngar dpyad pa'i bden pa dag la bdag nyid rtsol bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams yin te /
analyzed: de'i thams cad kyi tha ma rnam par mi rtog pa'i sems de'i mjug thogs su sngar dpyad pa'i bden pa dag la bdag nyid rtsol bar byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams yin te /
translated: The very last of all of that, the mind of non-conceptuality, immediately after that, the one who makes effort in the truths that were previously analyzed, those are the supreme mundane qualities.

original: de yan chad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kho na skye bar 'gyur gyi 'jig rten pa'i sems mi skye ba dang / de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i 'du byed rnams kyi mtshams dang mthar thug pa kho na yin pas na /
analyzed: de yan chad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kho na skye bar 'gyur gyi 'jig rten pa'i sems mi skye ba dang / de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i 'du byed rnams kyi mtshams dang mthar thug pa kho na yin pas na /
translated: And since those are the very end and limit of mundane compositional activity,

original: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams zhes bya'o //
translated: they are called the supreme mundane qualities.

original: de dag gi rjes la sngar dpyad pa'i bden pa dag la rtsol bar byed de /
analyzed: de dag gi rjes la sngar dpyad pa'i bden pa dag la rtsol bar byed de /
translated: Immediately after those, one strives at the truths that were previously analyzed.

original: brtsal ma thag tu ji ltar sngar go rims bzhin du dpyad pa'i bden pa mngon sum dang lkog tu gyur pa dag la rim gyis rnam par mi rtog pa shin tu nges pa'i ye shes dang / mngon sum gyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: brtsal ma thag tu ji ltar sngar go rims bzhin du dpyad pa'i bden pa mngon sum dang lkog tu gyur pa dag la rim gyis rnam par mi rtog pa shin tu nges pa'i ye shes dang / mngon sum gyi ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Immediately after striving, the nonconceptual, very certain pristine wisdom and the pristine wisdom of direct perception arise in order with regard to the truths that were previously analyzed, the manifest and the hidden.

original: de skyes pas khams gsum na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi phyogs su gyur pa'i gnas ngan len lus la gnas shing /
analyzed: de skyes pas khams gsum na spyod pa mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi phyogs su gyur pa'i gnas ngan len lus la gnas shing /
translated: When that arises, the negative tendencies that are the side of the afflictions to be abandoned by the path of seeing that are present in the body in the three realms are abandoned.

original: zhen pa gang yin pa de spong bar byed do //
analyzed: zhen pa gang yin pa de spong bar byed do //
translated: He abandons whatever he is attached to.

original: gal te dang po nyid nas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te dang po nyid nas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni /
translated: If he is free from attachment to the sense-pleasures from the very beginning,

original: de spangs nas bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu de'i tshe phyir mi 'ong pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de spangs nas bden pa mngon par rtogs ma thag tu de'i tshe phyir mi 'ong pa zhes bya ste /
translated: then immediately after realizing the truths, he is called a non-returner.

original: de'i rtags ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags sngar bstan pa dag nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rtags ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rtags sngar bstan pa dag nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: His signs of freedom from attachment should be understood as previously explained.

original: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de /🔽de'i der rdzus te skyes nas phyis 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar yongs su mya @191a * //
analyzed: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de / de'i der rdzus te skyes nas phyis 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong bar yongs su mya @191a * //
translated: But there is this difference:

original: las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: after being born supernaturally there, he later attains final Nirvana in this world without returning.

original: gal te de shas cher 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te de shas cher 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig yin na ni /
translated: If he is mostly free from attachment,

original: bden pa mngon bar rtogs ma thag tu /
analyzed: bden pa mngon bar rtogs ma thag tu /
translated: immediately after realizing the truths,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te /
translated: he becomes a once-returner.

original: 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas /
translated: Having returned once to this world,

original: sdug bsngal mthar phyin par byed do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal mthar phyin par byed do //
translated: he puts an end to suffering.

original: gal te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te 'dod chags dang ma bral ba zhig yin na ni /
translated: If he is not free from passion,

original: gnas ngan lan shin tu sbyangs nas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas ngan lan shin tu sbyangs nas rgyun du zhugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: he becomes a stream-enterer after purifying the lower realm.

original: de la mngon par rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du shes bya dang ye shes dang phrad par gyur pas na /
analyzed: de la mngon par rtogs pas zhes bya ba ni mngon sum du shes bya dang ye shes dang phrad par gyur pas na /
translated: Here, realization means that the object of knowledge and the wisdom are in contact, in the sense of being directly present.

original: de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ste ;
analyzed: de'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ste ;
translated: Therefore, it is called realization.

original: 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: For example,🔽when a member of the warrior caste and a member of the priestly caste come together, it is called a meeting.

original: rgyal rigs dang rgyal rigs lhan cig mngon du gyur pa la phrad pa zhes bya ba dang / bram ze la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: rgyal rigs dang rgyal rigs lhan cig mngon du gyur pa la phrad pa zhes bya ba dang / bram ze la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: The same should be understood for the priestly caste and so on.

original: de'i rtags ni 'di dag yin te /
analyzed: de'i rtags ni 'di dag yin te /
translated: The signs of that are as follows.

original: des shes ba bzhi po rgyu ba dang / gnas pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la nges par rtogs pa'i sgo nas chos tsam du shes pa dang / chad pa ma yin par shes pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par shes pa dang /
analyzed: des shes ba bzhi po rgyu ba dang / gnas pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la nges par rtogs pa'i sgo nas chos tsam du shes pa dang / chad pa ma yin par shes pa dang / rtag pa ma yin par shes pa dang /
translated: In all activities, abodes, and mental engagements, he knows that it is mere mental objects, not as annihilated, not as permanent, and not as a self.

original: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du byed sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de dag thob pa dang / de yul rnams la spyod pa na gal te brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa shin tu chen po dag byung bar gyur na yang des brtsal ba tsam gyis de dag myur ba myur ba kho nar med par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'du byed sgyu ma lta bur shes pa de dag thob pa dang / de yul rnams la spyod pa na gal te brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa shin tu chen po dag byung bar gyur na yang des brtsal ba tsam gyis de dag myur ba myur ba kho nar med par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: When they experience objects, if they become overwhelmed by the great fetters of the afflictions due to forgetfulness, they will quickly and immediately eliminate them simply by striving.

original: de bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bsams bzhin du bslab pa rnams las 'da' bar mi byed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed pa dang / bslab pa rnams phul nas spangs pa la 'jug par mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du ngan song rnams su 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / bsams bzhin du bslab pa rnams las 'da' bar mi byed pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed pa dang / bslab pa rnams phul nas spangs pa la 'jug par mi byed pa dang /
translated: They will not go to the lower realms, they will not intentionally transgress the precepts, they will not kill animals, and they will not give up the precepts and turn to a life of abandonment.

original: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed par 'gyur mi srid pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal rang gis byas par khas ma len pa dang / gzhan gyis byas par khas mi len pa dang / rang gis byas pa dang / gzhan gyis byas par khas mi len pa dang /
analyzed: mtshams med pa lnga'i las byed par 'gyur mi srid pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal rang gis byas par khas ma len pa dang / gzhan gyis byas par khas mi len pa dang / rang gis byas pa dang / gzhan gyis byas par khas mi len pa dang /
translated: It is impossible for them to commit the five heinous actions,🔽they do not accept that happiness and suffering are self-made, they do not accept that they are made by another, and they do not accept that they are made by both self and other.

original: rang gis byas pa dang / gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: rang gis byas pa dang / gzhan gyis byas pa yang ma yin la /
translated: It is impossible for them to commit the five heinous actions. They do not accept that happiness and suffering are self-created, nor do they accept that they are created by others. They do not accept that they are created by both self and others,🔽nor do they accept that they are uncaused.

original: rgyu med pa las byung bar yang khas mi len pa dang / @191b 'di las phyi rol pa'i ston pa gzhan yongs su mi tshol ba dang / spyin gnas gzhan yongs su mi tshol ba dang / dge spyod dang / bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor mi lta zhing ngor yongs su mi rtog pa dang /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung bar yang khas mi len pa dang / @191b 'di las phyi rol pa'i ston pa gzhan yongs su mi tshol ba dang / spyin gnas gzhan yongs su mi tshol ba dang / dge spyod dang / bram ze gzhan dag gi ngor mi lta zhing ngor yongs su mi rtog pa dang /
translated: They do not seek other teachers outside of this, they do not seek other objects of generosity, and they do not look to or consider the faces of other virtuous practitioners or brahmins.

original: chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting rnyed pa dang / nem nur las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis bkrir mi zug pa dang /
analyzed: chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting rnyed pa dang / nem nur las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa dang / gzhan gyis bkrir mi zug pa dang /
translated: and is not led by others.

original: ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: ston pa'i bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob pa kho na yin te /
translated: He has attained fearlessness regarding the Teacher's teachings.🔽He is not attracted to purity by means of the pure signs and marks,

original: de ni dag pa'i mtshan dang / bkra shis dag gis dag par mi 'dod pa dang / srid pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par mi byed pa dang / shes nas dad pa bzhi po dag dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni dag pa'i mtshan dang / bkra shis dag gis dag par mi 'dod pa dang / srid pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub par mi byed pa dang / shes nas dad pa bzhi po dag dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: does not create an eighth existence, and possesses the four kinds of knowledge-faith.

original: de la 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams kyi bar du ni de'i mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog rnams kyi bar du ni de'i mos pa las byung ba'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: Up to the supreme worldly dharmas, it is the attention arisen from belief.

original: bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa dag la ni /
analyzed: bden pa rnams mngon par rtogs nas mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams spangs pa dag la ni /
translated: Having realized the truths, he abandons the afflictions to be abandoned by seeing.

original: rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rab tu dben pa'i yid la byed pa yin no //
translated: This is the mental attention of complete seclusion.

original: de'i gong du nyon mongs ba spang ba'i phyir lam ji ltar thob pa goms shing byang bar byas pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: de'i gong du nyon mongs ba spang ba'i phyir lam ji ltar thob pa goms shing byang bar byas pa'i sgo nas /
translated: Above that, in order to abandon the afflictions, by means of cultivating and mastering the path as it was attained,

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa chen po dang 'bring po rnams spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa chen po dang 'bring po rnams spang ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to abandon the great and middling afflictions of the desire realm,

original: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te //
analyzed: lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te //
translated: one becomes a once-returner.

original: de'i rtags rnams kyang /
analyzed: de'i rtags rnams kyang /
translated: And the signs of that are

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i rtags rnams gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i rtags rnams gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: all the signs of a stream-enterer.

original: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: de la bye brag ni 'di yod de /
translated: But there is this difference:

original: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa chen po dang mthun pa'i yul rnams la spyod par byed kyang nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa dal bus skye zhing myur du spong bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar phyin par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa chen po dang mthun pa'i yul rnams la spyod par byed kyang nyon mongs pa'i kun nas dkris pa dal bus skye zhing myur du spong bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten 'dir lan cig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar phyin par byed pa yin no //
translated: even when engaging with objects that accord with the great fetters of affliction, the fetters of affliction arise slowly and are quickly abandoned, and having come to this world once, one brings suffering to an end.

original: phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir 'ong ba'i rtags rnams ni sngar bstan pa dag kho na yin no //🔽de la bsgom pa'i lam thams cad la ni dpyod pa'i yid la byed pas spangs pa dang / ma spangs ba la so sor brtags shing so sor brtags nas lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byas pas rab tu phye ba yin no //
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba dang phyir 'ong ba'i rtags rnams ni sngar bstan pa dag kho na yin no // de la bsgom pa'i lam thams cad la ni dpyod pa'i yid la byed pas spangs pa dang / ma spangs ba la so sor brtags shing so sor brtags nas lam ji ltar thob pa goms par byas pas rab tu phye ba yin no //
translated: The signs of the nonreturners and once-returners are just as previously explained.

original: de la bsgom @192a * //
analyzed: de la bsgom @192a * //
translated: In all the paths of cultivation, the path is distinguished by the mental attention of investigation, which abandons or does not abandon the object to be abandoned, and by the cultivation of the path as it has been attained, through investigating and investigating.

original: pa'i rang bzhin ni gang /
analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin ni gang /
translated: What is the nature of cultivation?

original: las ni gang /
analyzed: las ni gang /
translated: What is its activity?

original: rnam par dbye ba ni gang zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par dbye ba ni gang zhe na /
translated: What is its differentiation?

original: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pas 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i chos goms par byas pa dang / yongs su 'dris par byas pa dang / rtag tu byas pa dang / gus par byas pa de dag las byung ba'i bsgom pa sems kyi rgyud la 'jog par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsgom pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i yid la byed pas 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i chos goms par byas pa dang / yongs su 'dris par byas pa dang / rtag tu byas pa dang / gus par byas pa de dag las byung ba'i bsgom pa sems kyi rgyud la 'jog par byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni bsgom pa'i rang bzhin zhes bya'o //
translated: The nature of meditation is the placement of the mind in the stream of consciousness that arises from those conditioned virtuous qualities that are cultivated, made familiar, practiced constantly, and practiced with devotion, by means of the mundane and supramundane mental attentions of the stage of meditative equipoise.

original: de la bsgom pa'i las ni rnam pa brgyad de /
analyzed: de la bsgom pa'i las ni rnam pa brgyad de /
translated: The action of meditation is eightfold:

original: bsgom pas chos kha cig thob par byed pa dang / bsgom pas chos kha cig rten par byed pa dang / chos kha cig rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig sel bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig yongs su shes par byed pa dang /
analyzed: bsgom pas chos kha cig thob par byed pa dang / bsgom pas chos kha cig rten par byed pa dang / chos kha cig rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig sel bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig yongs su shes par byed pa dang /
translated: By means of meditation, some qualities are attained, some are supported, some are purified, some are removed, some are fully understood, some are actualized, some are manifested, and some are realized.

original: chos kha cig spong bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig mngon sum du byed pa dang / chos kha cig thag ring du byed pa'o //
analyzed: chos kha cig spong bar byed pa dang / chos kha cig mngon sum du byed pa dang / chos kha cig thag ring du byed pa'o //
translated: some dharmas are to be abandoned, some are to be realized, and some are to be made distant.

original: de la re zhig dge ba'i chos khyad par can ma thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni thob par byed do //
analyzed: de la re zhig dge ba'i chos khyad par can ma thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni thob par byed do //
translated: Among them, first, those special wholesome dharmas that have not been attained are to be attained.

original: thob cing mngon sum du gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni sten par byed do //
analyzed: thob cing mngon sum du gyur pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni sten par byed do //
translated: Those that have been attained and are manifest are to be cultivated.

original: de la thob pa mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni de dang rigs mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan pa dag gis phyis mngon sum du byed pa na shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu yongs su byang ba skye bar byed do //
analyzed: de la thob pa mngon du gyur pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni de dang rigs mthun pa'i chos rnams bstan pa dag gis phyis mngon sum du byed pa na shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / shin tu yongs su byang ba skye bar byed do //
translated: Among them, those that have been attained but are not manifest, when they are made manifest later by the teaching of dharmas of the same kind, he causes them to arise as completely pure and completely purified.

original: de la brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kun du 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i chos la goms par byas pa'i stobs kyis dang du mi len cing spong bar byed /
analyzed: de la brjed ngas pas nyon mongs pa can gyi chos kun du 'byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni dge ba'i chos la goms par byas pa'i stobs kyis dang du mi len cing spong bar byed /
translated: Among them, those defiled dharmas that arise through forgetfulness, he does not consent to and abandons them through the power of cultivating wholesome dharmas.

original: sel bar byed /🔽byang bar byed do //🔽de la spang bar bya ba'i chos ma skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni nad lta bur yongs su shes par byed cing sun 'byin par byed pa dang / 'bras lta bu dang / zug rngu lta bu dang / sdig pa dang /🔽mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yongs su shes par byed cing sun 'byin par byed do //🔽de yongs su shes shing goms par byas pas nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sel bar byed / byang bar byed do // de la spang bar bya ba'i chos ma skyes pa gang dag yin pa de dag la ni nad lta bur yongs su shes par byed cing sun 'byin par byed pa dang / 'bras lta bu dang / zug rngu lta bu dang / sdig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par yongs su shes par byed cing sun 'byin par byed do // de yongs su shes shing goms par byas pas nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir /
translated: and it purifies.

original: bar chad med pa'i lam skye bar byed cing des @192b spong bar byed do //🔽spangs pas na rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed do //🔽ji lta ji ltar sa gong ma dag gnon par byed pa de lta de ltar mthar thug gi bar du sa 'og ma pa'i chos spangs pa rnams thag ring du byed pa ste /
analyzed: bar chad med pa'i lam skye bar byed cing des @192b spong bar byed do //🔽spangs pas na rnam par grol ba mngon sum du byed do //🔽ji lta ji ltar sa gong ma dag gnon par byed pa de lta de ltar mthar thug gi bar du sa 'og ma pa'i chos spangs pa rnams thag ring du byed pa ste /
